description: Maeno Yuki is http://anidb.net/ch16963 [Kouki]`s wife, whom he meets in episode two. During Kouki`s involvement in the case of her brother Shougo, the two grow fond of each other and marry some time between episode two and three. In episode three, they have a son named Teruki. After Kouki`s death, Yuki continued to raise Teruki alone.
name: Maeno Yuki
